glee-review.description: Start a code review using Codex
glee-review.prompt: Call mcp__glee__start_review to get a code review from Codex. Based on the feedback, fix any issues and call the tool again until status is 'approved' or 'max_iterations'.

hooks.prompt: If code was modified (Edit/Write tools were used), ask the user: 'Do you want me to run a Codex review?' If they say yes, call mcp__glee__start_review.
